attributes.action: Name one of the new Type 26 naval vessels HMS Stafford
attributes.additional_details: We would like to petition the Ministry of Defence to name one of the new Type 26 naval vessels HMS Stafford. No ship has ever been named after the county town of Staffordshire. For a town that's over 800 years old and with links to the RAF and the Army it's a shame there is no link to the Navy.
